exercise.description: Represents a collection of tasks that is submitted at once

directory.description: Optionally a directory of the exercise

feedbackFile.description: An optional file path (relative to the submission directory) to a file that contains feedback information about all tasks of the exercise (can be left out when not yet known, if never submitted or if not existing)

submission.description: Tracks the progress of the submission either as one summary of all tasks or as a list of single tasks

exercise.title: Course Exercise

minimumPointsAllSubmissions.description: If set checks if the given minimum points was achieved over all submissions

minimumPointsPerSubmission.description: If set checks if the given minimum points was achieved for each submission

minimumPointsPercentageAllSubmissions.description: If set checks if the given minimum points percentage (0.0 - 1.0) was achieved over all submissions

minimumPointsPercentagePerSubmission.description: If set checks if the given minimum points percentage (0.0 - 1.0) was achieved for each submission

minimumSubmissions.description: If set checks if the given minimum submission count was achieved over all submissions

minimumSubmissionsPercentage.description: If set checks if the given minimum submission count percentage (0.0 - 1.0) was achieved over all submissions

submissionTask.description: Represents one task of all tasks of the exercise

achievedPoints.description: The total achieved points of this task of the exercise (can be left out when not yet known or if never submitted)

directory.description: Optionally a directory of the exercise

feedbackFile.description: An optional file path (relative to the submission directory) to a file that contains feedback information about this task of the exercise (can be left out when not yet known, if never submitted or if not existing)

name.description: An optional name of this task of the exercise

notSubmitted.description: An optional information that can be set to true if this task of the exercise was never submitted

points.description: The maximum points of this task of the exercise

submissionTask.title: Course Exercise Task Submission

submissionTaskSummary.description: Represents a summary of all tasks of the exercise

achievedPoints.description: The total achieved points of all tasks of the exercise (can be left out when not yet known or if never submitted)

notSubmitted.description: An optional information that can be set to true if all tasks of the exercise were never submitted

points.description: The maximum points of all tasks of the exercise

submissionTaskSummary.title: Course Exercise Task Submission Summary

description: Structured data object that can contain all information about submissions of a course (or part of a course) plus the requirements to pass the course (or part of a course)

$schema.description: Pointer to the schema against which this document should be validated (Schema URL/path)

progressName.description: Name of the course progress that is represented by the data when inserted in a markdown file for visualization (this allows for multiple such data files of the same course)

title: Course Progress Data
